metadata.title: Sitka Men's Insulated Fanatic Bib
features: Made in the USA or Imported
SCIENCE OF SOUND - The new Fanatic system Including Fanatic Bib allows a hunter the ability to move with more confidence by cutting the audible engagement distance in half
LARGE MULTI-CHAMBER CARGO POCKETS WITH SILENT SNAPS - Provide stealthy access to gear, customized storage for a wind indicator or phone, and secure zippered storage
FABRIC â€“ Enhanced high-loft Berber fleece-face provides excellent warmth and comfort, mapped burr-resistant textile on leg and gusset prevents burr pickup in key areas
TECHNOLOGIES - GORE-TEX INFINIUM which makes the beanie waterproof, windproof and breathable, and WINDSTOPPER Technology which allows moisture vapor to easily escape
INSULATION - Mapped 120-gram PrimaLoft Silver Hi-Loft ultra-insulation on torso and mapped 80-gram PrimaLoft Silver Hi-Loft ultra-insulation on legs
description: SITKA Gear was born from the belief that the experience of hunting is as important - if not more important - than the harvest. Going places few people go and enduring weather that keeps most hunters home is the fabric of Sitka Tribe. We live for the uncommon experiences and awe-inspiring moments found through the pursuit. Hunting offers a focus rarely afforded to us in the constant distraction we face in our day-to-day lives. It provides a meaningful connection to the wild around us, and it awakens the wild still within us. This connection grounds us, gives us much-needed perspective, and shapes our lives far beyond a day spent in the field.

title: Sitka Mens Insulated Fanatic Jacket and Bib
